text:
Hi everyone!
I’m creating a dynamic template based on HubDb table and trying to figure out how to use modules within the template.

This works:
  `{% if dynamic_page_hubdb_row %}     <h1>`
      `{{dynamic_page_hubdb_row.event_title}}`
    `</h1>`
  `{% endif %}`

But this doesn’t
   `{% if dynamic_page_hubdb_row %}`     
          `{% module "some_module" path="/path/to/module", label="some module" %}`  
  `{% endif %}`

Am I missing something here, should I inject module with hubdb info etc? Thanks!
